AllowedThumbprints: Array of certificate thumbprints. This is how the management API authenticates admins.

AssetsOriginOptions.AssetsEndpointHttps: URL to static assets server for css/js/images. Expects base url from where files are served from.

MainSiteOptions.Url: Url of main site for redirecting users out of management service pages.

ConnectionStrings.MariaDbConnection: MariaDB connection string to pull data from and update data on.
